text:
Indore is a city in the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. It is the largest city in Madhya Pradesh and 147th largest city in the world. It is 190 km away from Bhopal, which is the capital city of Madhya Pradesh.
The lifestyle of people of Indore is similar to Mumbai and also Indore is a rich city like Mumbai. So, Indore is also called "Mini Mumbai" (small Mumbai).
